author: dapplion
content: I'm implementing sync and it's very annoying having to read another block to know which pre-state you need to process a block

author: dapplion
content:
Now to process a block you need to
- fetch block N
- fetch parent(block N)
- fetch pre-state for block N, based on  parent(block N)
- run state transition

This extra dependency is awakward

author: potuz
content: Why wouldn't you have the parent information already in forkchoice in that case? You do not run forkchoice when forward syncing?
